nodes.html: Use this service to apply for an annual health and welfare review with your vet.

nodes.html: If you have multiple businesses that are registered to your rural payments account, you'll be asked which one you're applying for.

nodes.html: You’ll need your Rural Payments service customer reference number (CRN) and password to sign in.

nodes.html: You must be eligible to apply for an annual health and welfare review. Read the guidance on getting a funded annual health and welfare review of your livestock before you use this service.
